Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Arrhythmia/Supraventricular Arrhythmia/Junctional Rhythm
Record.Description: An electrocardiographic finding in which the pacer of the heart is located in the AV junction, normally presenting with a narrow QRS complex and a rate of 60-100 beats per minute.
